d49170b6-116d-4f2e-9bc6-227f99a9957d.description: The earner of this badge can understand points regarding family, work, school or leisure-related topics. The B1 user is capable of dealing with most travel situations in areas where the language is spoken. The B1 user can create simple texts on topics of personal interest as well as describe experiences, events, dreams, and ambitions, differentiating between opinions and facts.
d49170b6-116d-4f2e-9bc6-227f99a9957d.name: Certificate of Sufficiency in English B1

issuer.summary: issued by Centro de Educación Continua EPN

alignments.name: CEFR
alignments.description: The CEFR organises language proficiency in six levels, A1 to C2, which can be regrouped into three broad levels: Basic User, Independent User and Proficient User, and that can be further subdivided according to the needs of the local context.

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the English Sufficiency Exam B1 with the minimum evaluation grade of 73%

acd57792-c017-423d-b6d6-a8a9fa48c555.description: The earner of this badge can communicate easily and spontaneously in a clear and detailed manner. The B2 user is able to understand and be understood in most situations being able to interact with a degree of fluency and spontaneity. The B2 user can produce clear and comprehensive text on a wide variety of subjects as well as explain points of view using supporting arguments.
acd57792-c017-423d-b6d6-a8a9fa48c555.name: Certificate of Sufficiency in English B2

issuer.summary: issued by Centro de Educación Continua EPN

alignments.name: CEFR
alignments.description: The CEFR organises language proficiency in six levels, A1 to C2, which can be regrouped into three broad levels: Basic User, Independent User and Proficient User, and that can be further subdivided according to the needs of the local context.

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the English Sufficiency Exam B2 with the minimum evaluation grade of 73%

2a0c4d91-f3e7-4883-81d4-d5f7d4458f09.description: The earner of this badge can express oneself fluently and spontaneously without much obvious searching for the right expression. The C1 user manages language flexibly and effectively for social, academic and professional purposes. The C1 user produces clear, well-structured, detailed texts on complex subjects. The C1 user is capable of uphold arguments using coherent and solid statements.
2a0c4d91-f3e7-4883-81d4-d5f7d4458f09.name: Certificate of Proficiency in English C1

issuer.summary: issued by Centro de Educación Continua EPN

alignments.name: CEFR
alignments.description: The CEFR organises language proficiency in six levels, A1 to C2, which can be regrouped into three broad levels: Basic User, Independent User and Proficient User, and that can be further subdivided according to the needs of the local context. Se ha habilitado la compatibilidad con lectores de pantalla.

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the English Proficiency Exam C1 with the minimum evaluation grade of 73%
